info.title: Ghost eShop
info.author: Ghost eShop Team
info.description: An alternative eShop for 3DS, New3DS, New3DSxl, 2DS, New2DS, New2DSxl. Created on June 2020, over time this one has evolved enormously, to arrive at the current version on which it is currently

info.title: Pixel Paint
info.author: Sanuk Games
info.description: Easily create your own pixel art and publish it on Miiverse or save it on the SD card for use on social networks! A pixel art is an image created pixel by pixel, as in retro games. Base your creation on an old game or create something entirely new!

info.title: Plants vs Zombies
info.author: PopCap Games
info.description: The goal of the game is to defend your home against a zombie invasion. Zombies must pass through the garden or through the fireplace and it is with the help of plants and mushrooms that the player can defend himself against waves of zombies.

info.title: 3D Classics - Kid Icarus
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: The legend of Kid Icarus is retold in this 3D-enhanced version of the classic. Relive Pit’s first adventure in the 3D Classics: Kid Icarus game as you venture from the depths of the underworld up to the heights of the sky palace. Are you the stuff of legend?

info.title: 3D Classics - Kirby's Adventure
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: Delve into the land of dreams-turned-nightmares as Kirby™ flies with the stars in 3D. 3D Classics: Kirby's Adventure offers you a chance to explore the world of Dream Land in a whole new way.

info.title: 3D Classics - TwinBee
info.author: Konami
info.description: 3D Classics TwinBee will put you in command of the most kawaii spaceship in arcade history, but in 3D this time! Defend Donburi Island from the bellicose hordes of King Spice! You can shoot enemy spaceships, or drop bombs on invaders on the ground.

info.title: 3D Galaxy Force II
info.author: Sega
info.description: Save the galaxy from the Halcyon Empire! Re-mastered in 3D, Galaxy Force II 3D features drastically improved visuals and supports 16:9 wide screen and GamePad Pro. Arcade fans can now also enjoy Galaxy Force II in Arcade Cabinet mode!

info.title: 3D Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master
info.author: Sega
info.description: The Shinobi master is deadlier than ever! Joe Musashi's sworn enemies, the Neo Zeed, have returned! Controlled by Shadow Master, a formidable ninja cloned from Joe's own bloodline, the syndicate holds the city captive with its vicious crime ring. !

script.output: sdmc:/3D Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master (Europe) (eShop).cia

script.file: /3D Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master (Europe) (eShop).cia
sdmc:/3D Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master (Europe) (eShop).cia

info.title: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
info.author: Sega
info.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the arrival of seven dragons. One after another, they invaded Earth and have since begun the slaughter of the human race. The arrival of the Seven sweeps away any hope for humanity, unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon III Code: VFD.

script.output: sdmc:/7th Dragon III Code: VFD - DLC (USA).cia

script.file: sdmc:/7th Dragon III Code: VFD - DLC (USA).cia

info.title: 10-in-1 - Arcade Collection
info.author: Gamelion
info.description: Bring back those retro memories! Test your skill in each of the ten games in this classic arcade collection! Battle against time and enemies to achieve the highest score in each challenge in this 10 in 1: Arcade Collection.

info.title: Ambassador Certificate
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: The Nintendo 3DS Ambassador Program, is a program that Nintendo launched for the Nintendo 3DS. This program was made by Nintendo in recognition of players who bought the 3DS for $249.99 before the price dropped to $169.99 on August 12, 2011.

info.title: Azure Striker Gunvolt
info.author: Inti Creates
info.description: Azure Striker Gunvolt is an Action and Platformer video game developed by Inti Creates and released in 2014 for Windows, Nintendo Switch and Nintendo 3DS.

info.title: Barbie - Groom and Glam Pups
info.author: THQ
info.description: Barbie Groom and Glam Pups is an all-new Barbie video game, set in a fashion-oriented environment, that lets players choose a pup from one of six adorable breeds, then groom it, train it, dress it up and show it using the game's built-in economy.

info.title: Bella Sara 2 - The Magic of Drasilmare
info.author: Nacon
info.description: Return to the world of Bella Sara and rescue the Tree of Drasilmare! The great magic tree of Drasilmare has been cursed! Only you can reverse this dire spell and save the world from Bella Sara.

script.output: sdmc:/Bella Sara 2 - The Magic of Drasilmare (EUR).cia

script.file: sdmc:/Bella Sara 2 - The Magic of Drasilmare (EUR).cia

info.title: Bibi & Tina - Das Spiel zum Kinofilm
info.author: Kiddinx
info.description: You ride over hill and dale as Bibi or Tina through the wonderful landscape around the Martinshof. Persistent training with your horse will steadily improve your riding skills.

script.output: sdmc:/Bibi & Tina - Das Spiel zum Kinofilm (EUR).cia

script.file: sdmc:/Bibi & Tina - Das Spiel zum Kinofilm (EUR).cia

info.title: Bird Mania 3D
info.author: Teyon
info.description: When Mojo realizes that his friends from the fold have gone to Africa, he chases them like crazy because he wants to go on vacation too! Fly faster and faster, dive, zoom, slide and collect all the bonuses.

info.title: Bird Mania Christmas 3D
info.author: Teyon
info.description: Christmas time is almost here and the skies are crowded with Santa's elves delivering presents across the globe. Mojo the bird is still mid-flight in his pursuit of sunny Africa so with a little Christmas spirit and Santa's hat it's time to turn up the turbo and fly full blast to Africa!

info.title: Bomb Monkey
info.author: Renegade Kid
info.description: With an endless supply of bloks and a steady stream of bombs, you can partake in this legendary sport anytime you have a spare moment. Young Bomb Monkeys will learn patience and strategy.

info.title: Cave Story
info.author: NIS America
info.description: A young hero with amnesia discovers a hidden land and vows to protect the defenseless creatures that live there!

info.title: Cocoto - Alien Brick Breaker
info.author: Bigben Interactive
info.description:
A revolutionary new version of the classic game!
Travel through the 5 planets of Cocoto's world to protect them from alien fire by bouncing back the missiles with your magic shield. Take on a host of enemies with hilarious weapons and unlock new powers for your shield.

info.title: Colors! 3D
info.author: Collecting Smiles
info.description: Colors! 3D is a simple yet robust painting application that combines ease of use with the power of painting tools. Based on modern painting techniques developed for professional drawing tablets, Colors! 3D is suitable for touchscreen devices, and is for everyone from professional artists to Sunday doodles.

info.title: Crashmo
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: Welcome to Crashmo! Embrace the laws of gravity, and challenge yourself with a whole new kind of action-puzzle play in this exciting sequel to the critically acclaimed Pushmo™ game. New gravity mechanics and gadgets like floating blocks, doors, and move switches await.

info.title: Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: Prepare for monkey business with the king of the jungle! Donkey Kong and his primate helper Diddy Kong are back for even more action-packed platforming roles in Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D, an enhanced version of the Wii adventure Donkey Kong Country Returns, only for Nintendo 3Ds and Nintendo 3DS XL!

info.title: Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Cursed King
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: No new Dragon Quest has been released for many years, but after five years the world can get started with a new adventure. Before that, however, we can first get started with the Nintendo 3DS remake of Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King.

script.output: sdmc:/Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Cursed King (USA).cia

script.file: /Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Cursed King (USA).cia
sdmc:/Dragon Quest VIII - Journey of the Cursed King (USA).cia

info.title: Driver: Renegade
info.author: Ubisoft
info.description: The game includes over 80 missions and up to 50 cars that can be tuned in the garage. Tanner's abilities include a Rage bar to take down enemy vehicles. It also includes 7 Challenge Modes including Time Attack, Elimination Mode and Road War.

info.title: Edge
info.author: Two Tribes
info.description: In EDGE, the award winning retro inspired platformer, players take direct control of the cube and roll their way around the game's dozens of levels. Search for all the prisms, find the shortcuts to improve your times.

info.title: Face Racers Photo Finish
info.author: Majesco Entertainment
info.description: Start your turbo-charged engines and blast into the outrageous arcade racing game, Face Racers: Photo Finish, with photo customizable 3D racers that put YOU in the game!

info.title: Farming Simulator 18
info.author: Focus Home Interactive
info.description: Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Plant, harvest and trade crops, including sunflowers for the first time. Spread your activities with animal husbandry and forestry.

info.title: Fast & Furious - Showdown
info.author: Activision
info.description: As befits Fast & Furious, players get behind the wheel of some of the coolest cars to race to epic locations around the world. Players team up with two-player co-op and participate in high-stakes racing missions.

info.title: FIFA 15 - Legacy Edition
info.author: Electronic Arts
info.description: For the first time, players have a memory and show their emotions based on the context of the match. With more than 600 new emotional responses, players now respond to key moments on the pitch - dirty tackles, missed opportunities, fantastic goals - as they would in real life.

info.title: Fractured Soul
info.author: Endgame Studios
info.description: Fractured Soul takes the classic platformers of the 80s and doubles the action! Your unique ability to shift between two parallel dimensions ...

info.title: Fun! Fun! Minigolf Touch!
info.author: Shinen Multimedia
info.description: The second 3D golf title to hit the eShop, Fun! Fun! Minigolf TOUCH! offers a miniaturized approach compared to its counterpart Let’s Golf! 3D, but promises at least three times the level of exclamation points.

info.title: Gabrielles Ghostly Groove 3D
info.author: Natsume
info.description: Gabrielle's Ghostly Groove 3D is a dance game on 3DS. As a young girl lost in the world of ghosts, the player must dance to try to return to the living. There are about 20 songs to play on 3 levels of difficulty and 117 items to collect thanks to our efforts.

info.title: Gunman Clive
info.author: Horberg Productions
info.description: In the year of 18XX, the west is overrun by thugs and outlaws. A group of bandits have kidnapped Mayor Johnsons daughter and are spreading havok across the land. Only Gunman Clive can bring order to the west and save the girl!

info.title: HarmoKnight
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: Watch out, ears: the planet Melodia is under attack in the new game from the makers of Pokémon! Not only are the evil Discordoids, under their leader Gargan, disrupting the melodious lives of Melodia's inhabitants, but they've also kidnapped Ariana, the princess of Symphonica!

info.title: Harvest Moon - Skytree Village
info.author: Rising Star Games
info.description: Many people once lived in Skytree Village, where the land was green and lush. But the power of the Goddess of the Harvest has gradually diminished and the land has begun to dry up. It is up to you to revive the seven Skytrees and bring life back to this desolate land!

info.title: AKB48+Me
info.author: Kadokawa Shoten
info.description: AKB48+Me is a Japanese-exculsive Nintendo 3DS game released in 2012 where you can make your Mii a member of the AKB48 and join their performances.

info.title: Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Legacy
info.author: Bandai Namco Games
info.description: Assault Horizon Legacy features standard Ace Combat gameplay, specifically that of Ace Combat 04: Shattered Skies, designed for the Nintendo 3DS's controls, while using a slightly enhanced version of Ace Combat: Joint Assault's engine.

info.title: Acrylic Palette: Irodori Cafe - Cheers
info.author: Klon Co.
info.description: This work is a communication game set in a fictitious cafe. Real and active idols will appear as characters in the game as they are, and you can enjoy conversations and stories with them.

info.title: Aikatsu Stars! My Special Appeal
info.author: Bandai Namco Games
info.description: You can create 100,000 different characters. Includes Story Mode, Free Audition, Dressmaking, Music Video, and My Bedroom Mode for a total of 55 episodes, including 1 prologue, 6 episodes for each group, and 3 episodes for each character.

info.title: Aikatsu! 2-nin no My Princess
info.author: Bandai Namco Games
info.description: Like the last game, the game starts the player off with customizing their character. Also like the last game, there are two parts.

info.title: Aikatsu! My No.1 Stage!
info.author: Bandai Namco Games
info.description: A karaoke feature known as Aikara (Aikatsu! Karaoke) is added to allow players to sing along and is able to record one's voice, and the headset from the limited edition will assist this function.

info.title: All Kamen Rider: Rider Revolution
info.author: Bandai Namco Games
info.description: After being knocked out, Kamen Rider Ex-Aid awakens strapped down to a table in a room.

info.title: Silver Falls: 3 Down Stars
info.author: Sungrand Studios Pty. Ltd.
info.description: Silver Falls: 3 Down Stars is a survival horror game that can only be played on the New Nintendo 3DS. You read that correctly; developer Sungrand has released a game for the 3DS in 2020 that the majority of 3DS owners can't play.

info.title: Of Mice And Sand
info.author: CIRCLE Entertainment
info.description: By ordering the mice crew living in the Desert ship, you can build facilities on the ship and make food for breeding the mice with various items. With the development of the ship, more mice will join in and they can accomplish more jobs. Don't let them starve and make them rich.

info.title: Yume Nikki
info.description: This is a game that walking around the world in the dreams of a hikikomori named Madotsuki with a very dark atmosphere. Il n'y a pas d'histoire ou de but particulier. C'est juste un jeu de marche.

info.title: 1001 BlockBusters
info.author: Selectsoft
info.description:
You thought you had done the trick with brick-breaking games? You're wrong!
1,001 levels, 4 worlds: Ancient Greece, Middle Ages, Candy World and Magic Forest

info.title: 1001 Crystal Mazes Collection
info.author: Teyon
info.description: 1001 Crystal Mazes Collection is a jewel logic game in which a player pushes colorful crystals around a maze to their target destinations.

info.title: 101 Pinball World
info.author: Selectsoft
info.description: Get ready to take on this furious, bouncy pinball game! Complete specific objectives to earn crazy bonuses, sending your ball through pipes, ramps and mind-boggling obstacles.

info.title: 16 Shot! Shooting Watch
info.author: HUDSON SOFT
info.description: Fun and challenging in ten seconds! In the golden age of the 8-bit, Takahashi 'Master Higgins' Meijin made a splash by maintaining a rate of 16 presses per second.

info.title: 18th Gate
info.author: CIRCLE Entertainment
info.description: 18th Gate is not a game for the easily bored. It's a fairly basic strategy RPG that has you edging through.

info.title: 2-in-1 Solitaire
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: You've got Spider and Klondike versions of the card game, and they both have two initial difficulty settings to choose from, so once you've made your selections on both screens you're on your way to Solitaire heaven.

info.title: 21: Blackjack
info.author: Digital Leisure Inc
info.description: You begin 21: Blackjack with 1000 dollars and can place bets against the house in amounts as low as one dollar and as high as 500.

info.title: 24/7 Solitaire
info.author: GameOn
info.description: Solitaire is solitaire, so there's not much of a difference from any of the other titles in the regular game mode.

info.title: 2Puzzle It: Fantasy
info.author: Neuland Multimedia
info.description: This captivating game combines puzzle and fantasy worlds and is sure to get your brain working! Three game modes will make your life difficult, especially the Move mode.

info.title: 3 Heroes - Crystal Soul
info.author: Circle Entertainment
info.description: 3 Heroes - Crystal Soul is certainly not a bad game, but its repetitive nature and somewhat sluggish pacing make it feel more like work than play.

info.title: 3D Space Tank
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: The first 3D game on a handheld console, X will be considered by Famitsu magazine as one of the 4 most important games on Game Boy.

info.title: 3D Twist & Match
info.author: Sanuk Games
info.description: The game has three different game modes. In Classic Mode, players are continually given objects to match with their silhouettes while a timer is constantly draining...

info.title: 4 Elements
info.author: Joindots
info.description: You will have to solve puzzle grids by forming chains of jewels as long as possible in order to restore the magic of the four elements.

info.title: 4 Travellers: Play French
info.author: Agenius Interactive
info.description: Challenge your family and friends in a new digital board game while learning your first words in a new language together.

info.title: 4 Travellers: Play Spanish
info.author: Agenius Interactive
info.description: Challenge your family and friends in a new digital board game while learning your first words in a new language together.

info.title: 505 Tangram
info.author: Cosmigo
info.description: Solve the 505 puzzles of the different groups and become a tangram master! Many challenges await you!

info.title: 90's Pool
info.author: Cinemax
info.description: 90's Pool is completely average in every way. It has a few control related quirks that certainly rub us the wrong way.

info.title: 99Bullets
info.author: EnjoyUp Games
info.description: 99Bullets is a fun arcade-style shooting game where losing a bullet is losing a life and losing a life is losing a bullet.

info.title: 99Moves
info.author: EnjoyUp Games
info.description: 99Moves, a retro arcade game, where you have to survive with only 99 moves.

info.title: 99Seconds
info.author: EnjoyUp Games
info.description: 99Seconds is a fun video game with a retro aesthetic, where you can alter time to avoid a multitude of dangers.

info.title: StreetPass Mii Plaza
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: Place Mii StreetPass is a Nintendo 3DS program that uses the StreetPass features of the console. Mii's from different users can meet each other.
